accountManager.errorInstallEnable: Something went wrong. Please try again.

alertAccountNotInstalled.title: Install the PrestaShop Account module
alertAccountNotInstalled.message: You need the PrestaShop account module to continue setting up this module.
alertAccountNotInstalled.loading: The PrestaShop Account module is currently being installed...

alertAccountNotEnabled.title: Activate the PrestaShop Account module
alertAccountNotEnabled.message: You need the PrestaShop account module to continue setting up this module.
alertAccountNotEnabled.loading: The PrestaShop Account module is currently being activated...

multiShopSelector.title: Multi-store mode activated
multiShopSelector.subtitle: You must configure your stores one by one for this service but you will be able to use the same account.
multiShopSelector.selectStore: Please select the first store to configure from the list below
multiShopSelector.tips: After you are done with the first shop, you can configure the others by selecting them one by one in the shop selector, in the horizontal menu

alertEventBusNotInstalled.title: Install the Prestashop Event Bus module
alertEventBusNotInstalled.message: You need the Prestashop Event Bus module to continue setting up this module.
alertEventBusNotInstalled.loading: The Prestashop Event Bus module is currently being installed...

alertAccountNeedsUpdate.title: Update PrestaShop Accounts module
alertAccountNeedsUpdate.message: A new version of PrestaShop Accounts is available, please update the module to continue using the services

account.title: Associate your shop with a PrestaShop account
account.authorize: You can only associate your shop with one account. So be sure to choose the right one!
account.authorized: Your shop is associated with the PrestaShop account:
account.emailNotVerified:
Your email address has not been verified.
Please validate your address from the confirmation email in your inbox.
account.needToBeAdmin: In order to proceed you need to be administrator of the shop
account.unlinkShopModalTitle: Are you sure you want to unlink your store from your account ?
account.unlinkShopModalContent: By clicking on Yes, I confirm, you authorize your PrestaShop account to be unlink from the store.
account.unlinkShopAlert: Your store has been successfully unlinked
account.unlinkShopError: Error while trying to unlink shop
